title: philipma1957
author: philipma1957
content: Need one and I can't find a good price . $ 350 seems to be pretty high price for it.https://www.ebay.com/itm/314108747417?from china 248+85 = 333 plus tax over 350Any one have a good source for one at 300 or less?

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: I tried to search for a cheaper one but almost all offer $200+ or above.I only found one website that sells lower than $200 the only problem is I don't know if it's a legit site or not.Check this site Code:https://www.miners1688.com/product/whatsminer-p222b-psu-power-supply-unit-unistar/

comments.author: philipma1957
comments.created_time: October 10, 2023, 12:01:37 AMLast edit: October 10, 2023, 12:14:33 AM by philipma1957
comments.body: Quote from: BitMaxz on October 09, 2023, 11:17:12 PMI tried to search for a cheaper one but almost all offer $200+ or above.I only found one website that sells lower than $200 the only problem is I don't know if it's a legit site or not.Check this site Code:https://www.miners1688.com/product/whatsminer-p222b-psu-power-supply-unit-unistar/their shipping was far too high.I think I will use altairtech.iohe has one on eBay I made him an offer.

comments.author: mikeywith
comments.body: Quote from: philipma1957 on October 10, 2023, 12:01:37 AMDid you confirm it's a dead PSU not just a fan or something? anywayIf it's one of the miners you bought from me, I will try to get it repaired or replaced, I texted you on telegram requesting the serial number of the PSU, don't rush to buy another one just yet.

comments.author: seek3r
comments.body: Dont know how legit they are because the website is not very well designed but atleast they have better prices.They have four different warehouses, one is located in the US which should suit u. https://bitmars.io/product/whatsminer-power-supply-p222b-for-mining-psu/Got few different shops but they are all shipping from China which should end in ur price if you include taxes + shipping.
